bugs.description: Missing category tag on article page
bugs.fix_notes: Added category tag to post.html layout
bugs.root_cause_notes: Jekyll layout validation missing - no check for category tag display
bugs.test_gap_description: No visual validation of article page layout elements
prevention_actions: Created pre-commit hook for blog structure checks

bugs.description: Charts generated but never embedded in articles
bugs.fix_notes: Enhanced Writer Agent prompt + Publication Validator
bugs.root_cause_notes: Writer Agent prompt didn't explicitly require chart embedding. Graphics Agent created charts but Writer didn't reference them.
bugs.test_gap_description: No test verifying chart markdown exists in article body when chart_data provided
prevention_actions: Enhanced Writer Agent prompt with explicit chart embedding requirements
Added Publication Validator Check #7: Chart Embedding
Added agent_reviewer.py validation for Writer Agent outputs

bugs.fix_notes: Removed image: field from front matter
bugs.root_cause_notes: Unclear requirements: featured image vs embedded chart. Jekyll 'image:' field rendered as hero image, causing duplication.
bugs.test_gap_description: No visual regression test for article rendering with charts
prevention_actions: Removed 'image:' field from YAML frontmatter specification
Documented chart embedding pattern: use markdown only, not frontmatter
Updated Writer Agent to use single chart embedding method

bugs.description: GitHub integration broken - issues not auto-closing
bugs.root_cause_notes: GitHub close syntax in bullet list format not recognized. Sprint 4 regression.
bugs.test_gap_description: No test for GitHub webhook integration or commit message validation
